thread.title: BRIEF-Canada Pension Plan Investment Board Signs Agreement To Acquire Canadian Operating Wind And Solar Power Portfolio

title: BRIEF-Canada Pension Plan Investment Board Signs Agreement To Acquire Canadian Operating Wind And Solar Power Portfolio

organizations.name: acquire canadian operating wind and solar power portfolio reuters

text:
April 2, 2018 / 12:09 PM / a minute ago BRIEF-Canada Pension Plan Investment Board Signs Agreement To Acquire Canadian Operating Wind And Solar Power Portfolio Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Nextera Energy Partners LP: 
* CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CANADIAN OPERATING WIND AND SOLAR POWER PORTFOLIO 
* CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CANADIAN OPERATING WIND AND SOLAR POWER PORTFOLIO 
* CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT SAYS DEAL FOR $741 MILLION 
* ‍CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD SAYS PORTFOLIO INCLUDES 4 WIND AND 2 SOLAR PROJECTS WITH A TOTAL CAPACITY OF 396 MEGAWATTS IN ONTARIO​ * TERM AGREEMENT​
